member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies the motion estimation search block sizes that a video encoder supports.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE_FLAG_NONE
member.summary: Search block size is not supported by the encoder.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE_FLAG_8X8
member.summary: The encoder supports a search block size of 8x8 pixels.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_SEARCH_BLOCK_SIZE_FLAG_16X16
member.summary: The encoder supports a search block size of 16x16 pixels.
